name: Dusk Reaper
description:
A voxel-based, first-person horror experience set on the dark and lonely Canadian highway at dusk. 5 endings in total.

...SIGHTINGS OF WHAT PEOPLE ARE CALLING THE "DUSK REAPER" HAVE RISEN TO THE HUNDREDS, AND HYSTERIA IS GROWING. MANY FEAR THAT THESE SIGHTINGS MAY BE CONNECTED TO THE SUDDEN RISING DEATH COUNT THAT IS CAUSING QUITE A STIR IN KOPE AND THE SURROUNDING AREAS. THE RCMP HAVE MADE NO PUBLIC STATEMENT...
